price: 194. Ya Tuhan kami, berilah kami apa yang telah Engkau janjikan kepada kami melalui rasul-rasul-Mu. Dan janganlah Engkau hinakan kami pada hari Kiamat. Sungguh, Engkau tidak pernah mengingkari janji.”
arabic: رَبَّنَا وَءَاتِنَا مَا وَعَدتَّنَا عَلَىٰ رُسُلِكَ وَلَا تُخۡزِنَا يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۖ إِنَّكَ لَا تُخۡلِفُ ٱلۡمِيعَادَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā waātinā mā waʿadttanā ʿalā rusulika walā tukh'zinā yawma al-qiyāmati innaka lā tukh'lifu al-mīʿāda
